creator: knowtech@zbzoom.net
text:
A default directory of name_3 under tomcat webapps generates:

JKMount /name/3/* apj13 -> instead of /name_3/* apj13, etc.

in the auto generated mod_jk.conf. I did not test any generalization of this.

The auto-generated JKMount statement is actually correct.  The problem is that 
in order to have context names with an '_' character in the URL, you have to 
configure it explicitly (using apps-xxx.xml).  If you don't want it duplicated 
under the /name/3/ URL, you would also have to disable AutoWebApp in the 
server.xml.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 5523 ***
creator: william.barker@wilshire.com

text:
This is the right one.
